mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cinema( cinema_no, cinema_name, cinema_address, cinema_regdate, cinema_chgdate, cinema_status ) values ( seq_cinema_no.nextval, #{cinema_name}, #{cinema_address}, sysdate, sysdate, #{cinema_status, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select cinema_code from tbl_cinema where cinema_no = #{cinema_no}

select * from tbl_cinema
where cinema_no in ( select cinema_no from tbl_cinema_room where room_no in ( select room_no from tbl_room_timeline where ${search_column} = #{search_data} ) ) and
where ${search_column} like '${search_data}%' and
where
where ${search_column} like '%${search_data}%' and
cinema_status = 1 order by ${order_column} ${order_type}
